"I  understand, I'll leave right away so I can be back on time to 
greet them."
Phobia knew it isn't wise to fool with such a powerful being but his 
sense of self preservation made it necessary to get his thorax out of 
there.

He manually sets a course low across the planets surface.

"I can't steer myself into the path of the warship." He knew that 
would lead to his disconection. So with his newly upgraded ship he 
prepared to depart. 

"Just in case by some odd chance they survive I'll leave some babies 
to keep me informed."

At his command dozens of tiny spiders slip back into the base.(Each 
one is about the size of an american dime)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Sure, you need to get the bugs worked out of your ship, so 
have fun. And 
> we may have visiotors from the Rapier soon." Magmatron said. 
Thinking to 
> himself about what that spider really thought of him.
